tit.e: Kobunjigaku (the study of archaic words and phrases)

sen.j: 古文辞学（こぶんじがく）とは、江戸時代に興った荻生徂徠に始まる儒教の一派。
sen.e: Kobunjigaku (study of ancient rhetoric) is a sect of Confucianism founded by Sorai OGYU in the Edo period.
Kobunjigaku is a school of Confucianism founded by Sorai OGYU in the Edo period.
sen.cmt: 儒教は宗教というよりはむしろ学問なので、派はschoolとした方が良いのではないでしょうか。
sen.e: Kobunjigaku is a school of Confucianism founded by Sorai OGYU in the Edo period.

sen.j: 蘐園学派（けんえんがくは）とも。
sen.e: It is also called Kenengaku sect.
It is also known as the Kenengaku school.
It is also known as the Kenengaku school.

sen.j: 江戸時代中後期に盛んとなった。
sen.e: It became active in the middle to late Edo period.

It became active in the middle to late Edo period.

sen.j: 学問的には朱子学を批判し、伊藤仁斎の古義学に対抗した。
sen.e: Academically, it criticized Shushigaku (Neo-Confucianism) and rivaled Kogigaku of Jinsai ITO.
Academically, it criticized Shushigaku (Neo-Confucianism) and rivaled Kogigaku (the study of ancient principles) by Jinsai ITO.
sen.cmt: 前置詞は変えたほうが良いと思いました。 古義学の説明を補いました。
sen.e: Academically, it criticized Shushigaku (Neo-Confucianism) and rivaled Kogigaku (the study of ancient principles) by Jinsai ITO.

sen.j: 古文辞とは、明代の中国で提唱された復古的な文学運動。
sen.e: "Komonji" means the reactionary movement of literature advocated during the Ming dynasty era in China.
"Kobunji" is the restoration of literature advocated during the Ming Dynasty in China.
sen.cmt: 大辞泉より、古文辞（読みはkobunji）は「中国で明代に提唱された文学の模範とすべき古典」とあるので、正しくは「運動」ではなく「古典/文学」ではないかと思いましたが、原文どおりにしております。
sen.e: "Kobunji" is the restoration of literature advocated during the Ming Dynasty in China.

sen.j: 模範とする古典を文は秦漢期、詩は唐に求めた。
sen.e: Classics which it used as a model were those written during the Qin-Han era in the case of literature and those written during the Tang dynasty era in the case of poetry.
The models for poetry were found in classics from the Tang Dynasty; for other writings, those from the Qin and Han Dynasties.
Classics that were held up as being models of good literature were poetry from the Tang Dynasty and other writings from the Qin and Han Dynasties.
